title: Beijing To Discard A Whopping 50 Million Computers As US-China Tech War Reaches Crazy Levels - EurAsian Times
content: Beijing To Discard A Whopping 50 Million Computers As US-China Tech War Reaches Crazy Levels  EurAsian Times
description: The Chinese government has reportedly instructed its central agencies and state-backed enterprises to replace foreign-branded personal computers with domestic substitutes to eliminate crucial overseas technology from its most sensitive plants. The government has ordered the implementation of this change within the next two years, reported Bloomberg. The staff has been instructed to swap out their [â€¦]
